document.masterDocTitle: Cytotaxonomy of the Simuliidae (Diptera): a systematic and bibliographic conspectus

Simulium
subgeneric standard): Mongolia

Simulium arcticum Malloch
(complex)

NOTE : Included under
S. arcticum
(complex) are the following works that refer generally to the complex or to cytoforms not currently assigned to nominal species of the
S. malyschevi
species-group and for which specific status is not known.
